channel.title: Emmy Awards 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Emmy Awards 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Critic’s Notebook: A Flat Nate Bargatze and a Lame Time-Saving Gag Upstage Worthy Winners at the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards
item.description: The Boys & Girls Clubs of America had a roller-coaster night as ‘The Pitt,’ ‘The Studio’ and ‘Adolescence’ dominated.

item.title: Critic’s Notebook: A Flat Nate Bargatze and a Lame Time-Saving Gag Upstage Worthy Winners at the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards
item.description: The Boys & Girls Clubs of America had a roller-coaster night as ‘The Pitt,’ ‘The Studio’ and ‘Adolescence’ dominated.

item.title: Emmys: Graham Greene, Polly Holliday, Tony Todd Omitted From In Memoriam Segment
item.description: Hulk Hogan, Jonathan Joss and Lynne Marie Stewart were also missing from the section of the 2025 Emmys that remembered notable industry figures who have died over the last year.
